measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum within the country.
measures.measure: Residents of Latvia are able to enter the country and tourists are able to leave, but nobody else is allowed to come into the country.

measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum within the country.
measures.measure: People are allowed into the country again, but on a case to case basis.

measures.goal: To slow the spread of the virus
measures.measure: People had to keep a 2 meter distance as to not infect other people with the corona virus.

measures.goal: To stop the virus from spreading
measures.measure: When having symptoms you are required to self isolate.

measures.goal: To stop the spread of the virus.
measures.measure: People were asked to work from home as much as possible.

measures.goal: To stop the spread of the virus
measures.measure: Schools are closed to prevent the virus from rapidly spreading.

measures.goal: To stop the spread of the virus
measures.measure: Schools are closed to prevent the virus from rapidly spreading.
